entities.hint: A work of art, artwork, art piece, piece of art or art object is an artistic creation of aesthetic value.
An artist is a person engaged in an activity related to creating art, practicing the arts, or demonstrating an art.

samples: <woa>David</woa> completed by <artist>Michelangelo</artist> in 1504, is one of the most renowned works of the Renaissance. In early 1504 <artist>Leonardo da Vinci</artist> had been commissioned to paint <woa>The Battle of Anghiari</woa> in the council chamber of the Palazzo Vecchio, depicting the battle between Florence and Milan in 1440. <artist>Michelangelo</artist> was then commissioned to paint <woa>The Battle of Cascina</woa>.

<woa>Irises</woa> is one of several paintings of irises by the Dutch artist <artist>Vincent van Gogh</artist>, and one of a series of paintings he made at the Saint Paul-de-Mausole asylum in Saint-RÃ©my-de-Provence, France, in the last year before his death in 1890.
The picture bears a strong resemblance to many Renaissance depictions of the Virgin Mary

documents.text: The title of the painting, which is known in English as Mona Lisa, is based on the presumption that it depicts Lisa del Giocondo, although her likeness is uncertain. It was believed to have been painted between 1503 and 1506
